## Preparation: Libraries and Load Data
  
```{r prep, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

# load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)

df_raw <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AmandaSFox/DATA605_Math/refs/heads/main/Final/synthetic_retail_data.csv")
```

## EDA

```{r eda, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

glimpse(df_raw)

summary(df_raw)

# check NA (none)
df_raw %>% 
  summarise(across(everything(), ~sum(is.na(.))))

# check dup (none)
anyDuplicated(df_raw$Product_ID)

# distributions
df_raw %>%
  select(Sales, Inventory_Levels, Lead_Time_Days, Price, Seasonality_Index) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = everything()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = value)) +
  facet_wrap(~name, scales = "free") +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30, fill = "gray", color = "white") +
  theme_minimal()

```
